laterMeetingDialog.heading: Your connection details
laterMeetingDialog.description: Share this information with the guests. They will be able to join the meeting without needing to sign in. This meeting is permanent and can be reused.
laterMeetingDialog.permissions: People with this link do not need your permission to join this meeting.
